Nobunaga did die at Honnouji =
in 1582, attacked by Akechi Mitsuhide (or
did he get out and live out the r=
est of his years in peace as a farmer
in Southern Kyushu where he eventuall=
y became Hideyori's gardener
after he escaped from Osaka castle? Hmm?).  As=

Yagyu Juubei, I'm not sure off the top of my head, but=
